questions.question: On its own, which of the following is most likely an example of plagiarism?

choices.answer: Consulting an online resource when you write a paper
Putting a quote from a magazine article in your essay
Forgetting to include a bibliography
Paraphrasing the author of a published book

questions.question: What can you conclude from the fact that people often plagiarize without meaning to?

choices.answer: Plagiarism is not a serious offense
Plagiarism is not always black and white
The rules about plagiarism are too strict
Most teachers aren't aware of what plagiarism is

questions.question: How might you classify copying and pasting a paragraph from a website into a school assignment?

choices.answer: borrowing
giving
paraphrasing
stealing

questions.question: Many students inadvertently plagiarize b/c they're careless. What does inadvertently mean?

choices.answer: sneakily
intentionally
accidentally
criminally

questions.question: Why is plagiarism similar to fraud? Choose the best answer.

choices.answer: You're not paying to use your source's ideas or words
You're passing off your source's ideas or words as your own
Plagiarism wastes your teacher's valuable time
You're making money off of your source's ideas or words

questions.question: What is the best definition of a bibliography?

choices.answer: A short citation that lists the source of the quote
A quote that's properly cited
A list of all works cited in an essay
A paraphrased paragraph

questions.question: It's often said that plagiarizing is like cheating yourself. Why is this?

choices.answer: You'll probably get kicked out of school
Plagiarism is always caught and results in bad grades
Plagiarism is basically another word for cheating
You lose the opportunity to practice important skills

questions.question: Why is paraphrasing a good way to avoid plagiarizing a source?

choices.answer: It doesn't give any credit to an original source
it shows your readers you understand the subject
it suggests that you personally know the source you used
it shows your teacher you're able to use correct grammar
